DOC.brief_title: Initiation Allopurinol First Medical Contact Acute Attacks Gout
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Randomized , placebo-controlled , double-blind trial . Setting : Outpatient clinic , White River Junction Veterans Affairs Medical Center . Patients : 57 men crystal proven acute gout attack , first medical contact , within 7 day onset . Intervention : Subjects randomize receive allopurinol 300mg daily match placebo 10 day . All patient receive indomethacin 50mg TID 10 day , prophylactic dose colchicine 0.6mg BID 90 day , open-label allopurinol start day 11 . Measurements : Primary outcome patient report pain visual analogue scale ( VAS ) primary joint , self report flare joint day 1-30 . Secondary endpoint include urate , sedimentation rate , C-reactive protein level .
